name: AddTaskComment
description:
Add a comment to a specific task in Asana.

This tool adds a comment to a task in Asana, authored by the authenticated user, and returns the full record of the newly created comment.

parameters.name: target_task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to which the comment will be added. It is required to specify the task you want to operate on.

parameters.name: story_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the story to be created, including text, optional HTML formatted text, and other attributes.

gid.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

resource_type.description: The base type of this resource.

created_at.description: The time at which this resource was created.

resource_subtype.description: The subtype of this resource. Different subtypes retain many of the same fields and behavior, but may render differently in Asana or represent resources with different semantic meaning.

text.description: The plain text of the comment to add. Cannot be used with html_text.

html_text.description: [Opt In](/docs/inputoutput-options). HTML formatted text for a comment. This will not include the name of the creator.

is_pinned.description: *Conditional*. Whether the story should be pinned on the resource.

sticker_name.description: The name of the sticker in this story. `null` if there is no sticker.

data.description: A story represents an activity associated with an object in the Asana system.
